thread.title: Edward Tony Reed
thread.title_full: Biblio.com reviewed by Edward Tony Reed

author: Edward Tony Reed
title: Edward Tony Reed
text: Just received a cook book I recently ordered Biblio . The book was exactly exactly as it had be described or even better. I was very pleased at the timely arrival, the condition of the book and the packaging. I would both order from Biblio again and recommend them to my friends.
